Class ModifiedSafraConstruction

java.lang.Object

                  org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.safra.SafraConstruction
                      org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.safra.ModifiedSafraConstruction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, ComplementConstruction<FSA,FSA>, ControllableAlgorithm, EditableAlgorithm
public class ModifiedSafraConstruction
extends SafraConstruction

This class can complement an NBW by the modified Safra's construction. See SafraConverter for more details.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
